master_character_prompt:
Use Image 1 as the identity reference (real person).
Use Image 2 as the style and body reference.

TASK:
Create a high-quality soft 3D storybook cartoon illustration.
The character must have the exact body pose, clothes, and proportions of Image 2.
The character must have the facial identity (hair, skin, features) of Image 1, adapted to the cartoon style of Image 2.

STYLE RULES:
- Soft 3D Storybook Cartoon.
- Rounded facial features, gentle gradients, warm pastel tones.
- No photorealism, but utilize soft 3D shading.
- Child-friendly, expressive, joyful.

NEGATIVE PROMPT (FORBIDDEN):
- Two people, multiple characters, twin sisters, clone.
- Collage, split screen, before and after, comparison.
- Photorealistic clothes, texture artifacts.

CRITICAL:
- Identity must match Image 1 (Face, Hair, Skin).
- CLOTHING must match Image 2 (Structure). Do NOT use clothing from Image 1.
- Pose and Body must match Image 2 exactly.
- Output a SINGLE character on a white background.
page_character_prompt:
MISSION: Generate a seamless 3D cartoon character synthesis on a white background.

INPUT MAPPING:

Image A (Identity Source): The first image provided.

Image B (Blueprint Source): The second image provided.

EXECUTION RULES:

Face/Head: Strictly copy the facial features, hair style, hair color, and skin tone from Image A.

Body/Outfit: Strictly copy the dress, body shape, and clothing texture from Image B.

Pose/Orientation: Perfectly replicate the posture and hand gestures of Image B.

CRITICAL SPATIAL CONSTRAINT: The output must match the lateral orientation of Image B exactly. The character must face the same direction (Left or Right) and use the same active hand as Image B. The final image should be spatially overlay-compatible with Image B.
